DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to assess efficacy and safety of a recombinant grass Pollen allergen cocktail in allergic rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Grass Pollen Allergen Cocktail in the Treatment of Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Positive Skin Prick Test reaction to grass pollen Positive RAST result to grass pollen Positive Provocation Test result to grass pollen Serious chronic diseases Other relevant perennial allergies
